name: Richard S. Waring and Orville T. Waring Late Partners as Waring Brothers & Company, Appellants, v. The Pennsylvania Railroad Company

judges: Before Sterrett, C. J., Green,Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: Richard S. Waring and Orville T. Waring Late Partners as Waring Brothers & Company, Appellants, v. The Pennsylvania Railroad Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Green,
For the reasons expressed in the opinion just filed in the case between the same parties, 710 Dec. term 1879 ante, p. 172, the iudgment in this case is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Green,

casebody.head_matter:
Richard S. Waring and Orville T. Waring Late Partners as Waring Brothers & Company, Appellants, v. The Pennsylvania Railroad Company.
Argued Oct. 31, 1895.
July 15, 1896:
Appeal, No. 159, October Term, 1895, by plaintiffs, from judgment of O. P. No. 1, Allegheny Co., March T., 1880, No. 104, for defendant.
Before Sterrett, C. J., Green,Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
